description: .38 Super ammunition with a 147gr FMJ bullet.  The .38 Super round was developed from .38 ACP in the 1920s, designed to penetrate the body armor of the era.

.38 Super ammunition with a 147gr FMJ bullet.  The .38 Super round was developed from .38 ACP in the 1920s, designed to penetrate the body armor of the era.  This one has been hand-reloaded by a survivor or perhaps a pre-Cataclysm hobbyist, leading to slightly inferior performance compared to factory-produced ammo.
